Topic Summary: The Appellant disclaimed her interest in her late brother's estate. As a result of reducing and discounting down the liabilities, costs and expenses in her returns, an additional CAT liability arose and is being contested by her.
Tax Legislation: Section 10, Section 5, Section 12, Section 28, Section 89 Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003; Part 6 of the Revenue Commissioner’s Tax and Duty Manual (CAT Part 06 – Disclaimers of benefits);
